item.title: WhatsApp users can now add songs to their Status updates
item.description: WhatsApp launched a new feature on Friday, where users can include brief music clips in their Status updates, reminiscent of the Myspace era. Status r...

item.title: YC-backed Taxo raises $5M to slash healthcare admin with its AI ‘reasoning engine’
item.description: YC-backed startup Taxo has raised a $5m seed round to save doctors time and money on admin work.

item.title: Mozilla patches Firefox bug ‘exploited in the wild’, similar to bug attacking Chrome
item.description: The bug fix comes days after Google fixed a similar vulnerability under attack in its Chrome browser.
